definition.featurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="feature_container" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><value name="feature"><block type="feature_block_pile"><value name="block"><block type="mcitem_allblocks"><field name="value">CUSTOM:GlowrootLeaf</field></block></value></block></value><next><block type="placement_count_on_every_layer"><value name="count"><block type="int_provider_uniform"><field name="min">6</field><field name="max">14</field></block></value><next><block type="placement_biome_filter"><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">We add a biome filter, so that the patches don't generate outside of the current biome</comment><next><block type="placement_block_predicate_filter"><value name="condition"><block type="block_predicate_all_of"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" inputs="2"></mutation><value name="condition0"><block type="block_predicate_matching_blocks"><field name="x">0</field><field name="y">-1</field><field name="z">0</field><value name="blockSet"><block type="block_holderset_list"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" inputs="1"></mutation><field name="block0">CUSTOM:GlowrootedStone</field></block></value></block></value><value name="condition1"><block type="block_predicate_is_air"></block></value></block></value><next><block type="placement_height_range"><value name="height"><block type="height_provider_very_biased_to_bottom"><field name="inner">1</field><value name="min"><block type="vertical_anchor_absolute"><field name="value">-50</field></block></value><value name="max"><block type="vertical_anchor_absolute"><field name="value">100</field></block></value></block></value></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block><block type="feature_simple_random_selector" x="1070" y="21"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" inputs="2"></mutation><value name="feature1"><block type="feature_forest_rock"><value name="block"><block type="mcitem_allblocks"><field name="value">CUSTOM:GlowrootLeaf</field></block></value></block></value></block><block type="int_provider_constant" x="1074" y="202"><field name="value">3</field></block><block type="block_predicate_all_of" x="1564" y="192"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" inputs="2"></mutation></block><block type="feature_forest_rock" x="1268" y="295"><comment pinned="false" h="70" w="313">This block represent a forest rock, like the ones found in Old Growth Taigas. This feature should be added during the LOCAL_MODIFICATIONS step</comment><value name="block"><block type="mcitem_allblocks"><field name="value">Blocks.MOSSY_COBBLESTONE</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">This is the block that makes the forest rock.</comment></block></value></block><block type="placement_count" x="-6" y="482"><value name="count"><block type="int_provider_constant"><field name="value">8</field></block></value></block><block type="block_predicate_has_sturdy_face" x="1176" y="465"><field name="x">0</field><field name="y">0</field><field name="z">0</field><field name="direction">DOWN</field></block><block type="mcitem_allblocks" x="608" y="507"><field name="value"></field></block><block type="placement_rarity" x="660" y="508"><field name="rarity">1</field></block><block type="feature_random_patch_simple" x="1253" y="486"><field name="tries">128</field><field name="xzSpread">5</field><field name="ySpread">2</field><value name="block"><block type="mcitem_allblocks"><field name="value">CUSTOM:GlowrootLeaf</field></block></value><value name="condition"><block type="block_predicate_is_air"></block></value></block><block type="block_predicate_is_air" x="220" y="545"></block><block type="placement_count" x="1176" y="518"><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">We try to generate this feature twice in each chunk</comment><value name="count"><block type="int_provider_constant"><field name="value">3</field></block></value></block><block type="block_predicate_any_of" x="491" y="607"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" inputs="2"></mutation><value name="condition1"><block type="block_predicate_solid"><field name="x">0</field><field name="y">-1</field><field name="z">0</field></block></value></block><block type="block_predicate_all_of" x="-154" y="699"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" inputs="2"></mutation></block><block type="placement_height_uniform" x="1537" y="623"><comment pinned="false" h="84" w="208">We then set the height of the feature. This ore feature generates with a uniform distribution between 0 and 160</comment><value name="min"><block type="vertical_anchor_absolute"><field name="value">-50</field></block></value><value name="max"><block type="vertical_anchor_absolute"><field name="value">100</field></block></value></block><block type="placement_in_square" x="1336" y="644"><comment pinned="false" h="83" w="182">We then move each patch horizontally. This way they don't generate only in the corner of the chunk</comment></block><block type="block_holderset_tag" x="535" y="692"><field name="tag">minecraft:dirt</field></block><block type="block_predicate_is_air" x="339" y="733"></block><block type="height_provider_constant" x="559" y="738"><value name="value"><block type="vertical_anchor_absolute"><field name="value">64</field></block></value></block><block type="placement_block_predicate_filter" x="146" y="800"><value name="condition"><block type="block_predicate_is_air"></block></value></block><block type="placement_heightmap" x="964" y="774"><field name="heightmap">OCEAN_FLOOR</field><comment pinned="false" h="92" w="165">We then move the patches at the highest motion blocking block, so that they generate on the surface</comment></block><block type="feature_ore" x="-154" y="943"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" inputs="1"></mutation><field name="size">33</field><field name="discardOnAirChance">0</field><comment pinned="false" h="141" w="272">This block represents a feature for dirt "ore". Underground dirt blobs can only replace natural stone blocks. Ores should be generated during the UNDERGROUND_ORES generation stage.</comment><value name="target0"><block type="ore_target"><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">If the target block is one of the overworld base stones, replace it with dirt</comment><value name="target"><block type="rule_test_tag_match"><field name="tag">base_stone_overworld</field></block></value><value name="state"><block type="mcitem_allblocks"><field name="value">Blocks.DIRT#0</field></block></value></block></value></block><block type="placement_height_uniform" x="1279" y="892"><value name="min"><block type="vertical_anchor_absolute"><field name="value">0</field></block></value><value name="max"><block type="vertical_anchor_absolute"><field name="value">100</field></block></value></block><block type="placement_count" x="-154" y="1064"><comment pinned="false" h="92" w="224">Placement modifiers are processed from top to bottom. First, we repeat the feature 7 times on every chunk</comment><value name="count"><block type="int_provider_constant"><field name="value">7</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">This is how many times the feature is repeated.</comment></block></value><next><block type="placement_in_square"><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="189">We then move each feature horizontally, so that they don't generate in the corner of the chunk</comment></block></next></block><block type="placement_biome_filter" x="-118" y="1209"><comment pinned="false" h="85" w="210">Finally, we check that the feature isn't outside of the biome. This placement modifier should always be the last one.</comment></block></xml>
